articles.description: The latest Birmingham City news and views from BirminghamLive as Blues supporters protested against the club's owners
articles.content:
John Ruddy accepts the right of Birmingham City supporters to "voice their displeasure" after Saturdays 2-1 defeat to Preston North End saw fresh protests against the clubs owners.
Blues were 2-0 do… [+3234 chars]
